name: Beyond the Zoo Wall
description:
You play as a giraffe leaving his zoo walls for the first time. After a quarantine from a mysterious pandemic, humans have begun to mysteriously disappear. Even from their homes. You join a small dog who wants to find his owner, while braving dangers like predators.

The combat system has four attack types, but they are dependent on a timer. Some attacks you'll have to wait until the timer bar reaches a certain level, in order to activate it. Some attacks take a huge amount from the timer bar, while others, like Bite, don't take any amount.
